item.description:
Manchester Community College is hosting a monthly free movie in its new facility, MCC on Main - 903 Main St. • Manchester

“Reel Sundays on Main”
Come and enjoy a free film courtesy of Manchester Community College
www.mcc.commnet.edu/mcc-on-main
July 29th at 1–3 p.m.
"Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol"
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1229238/

NOTE: Some people might go out afterwards for a snack or sandwich, this date I have a Shakespeare-in-the-Park event in West Hartford so will be heading back there after the film.
item.name: FREE MOVIE - "Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol"
